# Amalgamation
---
#noun
- **The process of [[a/_amalgamating|amalgamating]]; a [[m/_mixture|mixture]], [[m/_merger|merger]] or [[c/_consolidation|consolidation]].**
- **The result of [[a/_amalgamating|amalgamating]]; a [[m/_mixture|mixture]] or [[a/_alloy|alloy]].**
- **The [[i/_intermarriage|intermarriage]] and [[i/_interbreeding|interbreeding]] of [[d/_different|different]] ethnicities or races.**
